channel.title: Homes on Amartya
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Amartya

item.description: Biography I, Amartya Sanyal, have graduated from IIT Kanpur with a B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering and am going to join The University of Oxford from Oxford, 2017. For this position. I am going to be funded by THe Alan Turing Institute during this endeavour of mine. I will be supervised by Prof. Varun Kanade and Prof. Phil Torr during the period. During the summers, I will be interning in the Cortex group of twitter under the mentorship of Nicholas Koumchatzky, who heads the Twitter Cortex group.

item.title: Visits
item.description: I have had the opportunity to visit a few places and carry out my research there. Here is a list of the places and what it is that I have mainly worked on during those visits. Computer Vision And Pattern Recognition Unit, ISI Kolkata - A hybrid architecture for face recignition in real life scenario. Machine Learning Team, Amazon.com Worked on a competitive pricing model. Montreal Institute of Learning Algorithms Worked on a novel Multiscale Language Model with a learned dictionary.
